about_the_game:
My Chameleon Girlfriend is a beautiful AVG visual novel GALGAME developed by YIMI GAME.
A domineering mischievous girl falls in love with me? Shove a Handbook of ‘Male Virtue’ into my hands?
School Prima Donna loves me only? Be gentle with me in every way possible?
Absurd, this is just a daydream. In fact, there are hidden secrets about the beautiful girl who loves me ...
Heck! they can all transform!?
Should I be a slave of a wealthy woman, or be a spare-tire of the school Prima Donna?
The rich woman is infatuated with everything about me, she only listens to my words and remains steadfast!
The Prima Donna loves me for my spunk, grit, assiduity, and intelligence, and vows to snatch me from the hands of the mischievous girl!
This is a personal secret with the female protagonists, my chameleon girlfriend!
My lover is the analytical-mind mischievous girl, and my admirer is a beloved idol.
Do I choose to cosset the mischievous girl, or the idol Prima Donna?





The daughter of the chairman of Lance Lance Group, at a young age, ranks 62nd on the wealth list of young people under the age of thirty in the world. “I often wear thick glasses and have a rustic appearance.” In fact, hidden under Kiki's thick glasses is a beautiful appearance and a little mischievous heart.


The school Prima Donna in her grade, often active in major fashion magazines and film screens, Shelly is one of the top newcomer of beautiful female celebrities. She has a gentle and obedient personality, and is considered a good girl by her teachers and classmates. However, she is a bit dizty and not good at learning things. In fact, there is another secret hidden beneath Shelly's cute appearance, which is that she is actually...


Visual novels, by reading the game plot and choosing different options, establish an affectionate bond with the female protagonists, and achieve different endings.

Thank you all for participating in the production of this work!
Thank you to the players who have always supported and accompanied us, giving us encouragement!
Thank you for your support of 'My Chameleon Girlfriend'!
I hope this story can bring you positive energy and happiness!
Thank you for your support of YIMI GAME!

【 Initial thought 】
Hello everyone,
I am the producer YIMI.
The project has a longer delivery cycle than I initially expected.
The problems and difficulties encountered were never imagined, but I feel really happy to be immersed in the world surrounded by beautiful girls.
The kickoff idea was very simple, it was to think that the beautiful girls in the eyes of boys are super cute, lovely!
Meanwhile, it also come to our mind that we also intend to make a beautiful gal-game, haha.
Although this is not the by no means a perfect game, I still hope that this game can bring players a pleasant gaming experience.
Feel free to give us any good suggestions and join our QQ discussion fans group 855541897.


========TIPS===============
The English story of the game is still being improved.
Since we are short of manpower in all aspects,
we will definitely provide better services for English players in the later stage.
We will even consider adding Japanese translation. Thanks!
